name: treatment of used refrigeration machine, R134a as refrigerant | used refrigeration machine, R134a as refrigerant | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12404/documentation

This dataset represents the treatment of used refrigeration machine which uses R134a as refrigerant.

The activity starts when the used refrigeration machine enters the waste treatment facility.

The data on energy needed during dismantling are unknown. 

The activity ends by different waste materials being ready for further treatment.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The inventory is created by looking at the material composition of the container.
